prompts.name: Analyze Candidate Fit
prompts.template: Analyze this job information and provide insights about the candidate's qualifications and potential fit for the role based on their answer to the internal question.

prompts.name: Evaluate Salesforce Skills
prompts.template: Evaluate the candidate's Salesforce skills based on their answer: '{{answer}}'. Consider their experience with automations, integrations, and overall Salesforce knowledge. Provide a detailed assessment and suggestions for improvement.

prompts.name: Technical Skills Assessment
prompts.template: Based on the candidate's answer: '{{answer}}', assess their technical skills. Consider the depth of knowledge, familiarity with specific tools, and ability to apply technology to business problems. Provide a rating out of 10 and justify your assessment.

prompts.name: Generate Follow-up Questions
prompts.template: Based on the candidate's answer: '{{answer}}', generate 3-5 follow-up questions that would help further assess their technical skills and experience. Focus on questions that would reveal their depth of knowledge and problem-solving abilities.

prompts.name: Generate Next Interview Question
